data.price: Kuma ku nẽmi taimako da yin haƙuri, da salla. Kuma lalle ne ita, haƙĩƙa, mai girma ce fãce fa a kan mãsu tsõron Allah.
data.arabic: وَٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلۡخَٰشِعِينَ

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taʿīnū bil-ṣabri wal-ṣalati wa-innahā lakabīratun illā ʿalā al-khāshiʿīna

dua.name: Dua for Patience and Perseverance
dua.significanceReason: Emphasizes the power of patience, seeking divine support during challenging and trying times.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
